inclusion.criterion: Patient is between 18 and 65 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bilateral pulmonary opacities not fully explained by pleural effusions, atelectasis, or hydrostatic pulmonary edema for <48h
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Refractory hypotension (> 0.2 mcg/kg/min of norepinephrine or equivalent dose for 6 h or longer)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago.
